title: Commercial Building for Sale in Colombo -12
details:
Commercial building for sale in Colombo 12
Facing dam Street,

(Located between two roads, for easy access)

The building has 3 floors with approximately 1200 square feet per floor, total being 3600 Square Feet

(Value of the building not quoted for the asking price)

Land extent - 11 perches + 9.3 Perches = Total 20.3 Perch (can be sold separately)
Road frontage – 45 - 50 feet

Ideal for commercial purposes

Expecting Price: Rs 12.5 Million per Perch (Negotiable)
Genuine Buyers Only
No Brokers

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
